name: NetCoreVersionExtractor
description: Extracts the Version property from a .csproj file created for .NET Core / Standard 2.0+.
author: Matthew de Beer

inputs.name: projectFileLocation
inputs.label: Project file location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the project file from which to extract the Version property.

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Build variable prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an optional prefix for the variable name containing the Version. If provided, the variable name will be $(Prefix-ProjectVersion), else it will be $(ProjectVersion).

inputs.name: setBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set Build Number to Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally set the Build Number to the found version.
